map.string: Enable keys to modify camera and focus offsets
Open a new IM tab when another person begins typing to you and announce that they are doing so.
Enable target omega code from Viewer 3.4
Don't let the simulator push your camera around
Rigged mesh selection behavior: 0 = Never select, 1 = Hold shift to select, 2 = Hold shift or have build or inspect floater open
Allow crouch toggle by holding shift
Notify when going to a simulator of different version
Number of tiles of void water
Support pen tablets and absolute pointer devices by disabling mouse wrapping
Choose whether to always use the region's environment settings when they are available or to allow the manual selections to remain unchanging.
Distance after which HUD text starts to fade
Allow CCS HUD to override nameplates.

The bandwidth (in kbit/s) to strive for. Smaller values might reduce network congestion (sim ping time, aka avatar responsiveness). Higher values might download textures and the inventory faster, although in some cases a too high value might actually slow that down due to serverside throttling. If unsure, choose 2000.
Maximum number of entries to allow in teleport history list.
Adjusted when scrolling back and forth while holding rightclick in mouselook (Zoomed in < 1.037 < Zoomed out)
Bypass stricter sound size/sample checks, which were introduced in SL2.x, for sound decoding.
Use older JPEG2000 size estimation method
Turn on to highlight misspelled text in line edit boxes
The base dictionary to spell check with
Allow LSL calls (such as LLMapDestination) to spawn viewer UI
Rectangle for the object backup floater
Whether or not to use Windlight settings presented by the server.
Enable AO quick access remote in toolbar

Disables the internal hover up animation (on your local computer only). Enable if you use an AO and wear hand attachments like rings, prim nails etc. that often loose their correct position while flying.
Overrides fly animations with swims when underwater.
Sets AOSwimEnabled to true, and plays swims instead of flies, even if not underwater.
Where to fetch updated client definitions from
Last grid selected from the grid pulldown
Fetch list of grids from location set in GridUpdateList
URL to fetch Grid updates from
By setting to true, you agree to accept the Vivox license agreement at http://www.vivox.com/vivox_aup.html
Add clothing and attachments instead of having them replace the currently worn or attached item at their destination.
When not zero, new incoming conference chats will not be opened, if 2 only those from nonfriends will be blocked.
Fly after standing up, if you were flying when you sat down
Whether or not to animate when going into appearance mode.
Show grid name in the viewer window title (takes effect upon next login)
Append timestamp to date in the lists of past group notices
When enabled, /me chat will be italicized.
When false, new inventory items will not be highlighted upon being accepted.
When off, muted people will go unrendered...
When creating a new landmark, the legacy format (parcel name, region name (x, y, z)) will be used.
When opening a chat log, open in an external text editor instead of a browser floater(Windows and Mac Only).
Legacy outfits in clothing folder, completely made of links.. no other settings will apply for legacy outfits as they'll all be links.

While true, automatic detach is performed upon all copyable attachments just before legacy outfit creation to preserve any modifications to them. As a last resort, setting this false allows creating a legacy outfit that won't save changes made to copyable attachments since wearing them or login.
Automatically scroll to the end of a chat's history when the chat regains focus.
Whether or not to display system time in the top bar instead of server time.
Whether or not to display the count of avatars in each region on the world map as part of the region name and maturity label.
Whether or not the build tools floater is tinified (except in Land tool)
Whether or not floaters open during third person will be hidden while in mouselook
Whether or not the main menu bar will be hidden in mouselook
Whether or not notices will be hidden in mouselook
Whether or not the toolbar will be hidden in mouselook
Whether or not the right click zoom in mouselook will be instant or smoothly transition between zooms
Controls if holding Alt and right clicking in mouselook will bring up a menu
The high threshold number used to calculate the colors displayed for new ARC numbers, when LiruSensibleARC is false. Default is 20000.
Sound ID to play when ding is on for an IM session and an IM comes in.
Sound ID to play when ding is on for an IM session and a system message comes through, like when the correspondent starts typing or logs off. (Defaults to off)
Whether or not ding defaults to being on for new IMs.
Use notifytips for transactions instead of notifys, this way they do not collect in the top right of the screen.
Determines if Friend is Online notifications will do anything when clicked. (0 does nothing, 1 starts an IM (default), 2 opens profile.
Whether or not to spawn the region restart notice minimized (Useful for sim owners and people who need to pack up before leaving)
When false, the ui view won't resize when the screen does (floaters won't move around without user interaction, but they also might be restricted from moving everywhere).
When false, scripts that have errors won't steal focus once they've been failed to compile
Use the old-style way to calculate Avatar Render Cost. Found in Advanced->Rendering->Info Displays
Whether or not to bypass stripping out the last name Resident
Threshold of money changes before which transaction notifications will not be shown.
Use ctrl-alt(-shift)-d to toggle the advanced menu.
Use context menus instead of the default pie menus we all know and love.
Use ZQSD layout instead of WASD.
Shows the X and Y coordinates above the sim name in the world map.
Display the client tag on a new line

Use a realistic first person view, this prevents your camera from being the center of everything and your avatar always beeing locked below you, it allows your Avatar to move around freely in mouselook while your camera will follow it around. Prepare your seatbelts for an awesome shaky View! May break with certain super unrealistic animations.
Lines of history to load from log file if LogShowHistory is true.
Whether or not groups and friends lists use horizontal buttons at the bottom of the panel or vertical ones on the right, requires a restart.
Align texture maps (texture, bumpy, shiny) across the faces of a prim
Default setting for whether local textures should update or not upon change, changed by toggling on or off.
Path to your log files if you've never set the path while logged in on this account.
Channel used for interaction with the Script Message API
Key to encode messages sent to the Script Message API
Whether or not IMs use buttons concisely on the same line as the name of the receiver, changes apply to new IMs only.
Whether or not group chats use buttons concisely on the same line as the group name, changes apply to new group chats only.
Whether or not conferences use buttons concisely on the same line as the name of the conference, changes apply to new conferences only.
Whether or not local chat should have an input bar when undocked.
Whether or not to show chat from muted people in local chat.
When true, chats other than local chat open torn off of the Communicate window.
When this and OtherChatsTornOff are true, new chats open torn off and minimized.
When true, the keyboard shortcut for Communicate will not bring up the torn off Friends List.
How fast, in seconds, the Merchant Outbox will update through all phases This should be as low as possible, but too low may break functionality
The New IMs button in the bottom left will show the count of unread conversations instead of the total count of unread IMs if this is true.

When NewIMsPerConversation is on, this determines when the New IMs button becomes visible while the communicate floater is closed. True will wait until a new IM is received, false displays as long as a conversation is unread.
Setting this to TRUE resets your camera when you left-click your avatar
When true, resetting view by hitting escape or using the menu entry will turn your avatar to the direction the camera was pointed
When false, right clicking on objects that are certain angles from the direction your avatar is facing will not turn your avatar to face them.
Show a notification when someone changes their display name
Show the channel information for the current sim in the status bar
Show the count of unread IMs in the communicate flyout list
Show your position coordinates before the name of the parcel in the status bar
Show buildings and megaprims on the mini-map
Show group name in IM notification
Announce if someone bumps into you.
Announce if someone nearby has taken a snapshot in chat (Won't work on people who hide/quiet snapshots)
Announce the metadata of the track playing, in chat, during streams.
List for blacklisting assets DO NOT EDIT DIRECTLY use the floater
Show links for chatting objects (0=no, 1=for others' objects, 2=for all objects)
Disable pointing at objects and the pointat beam
When TRUE, do not disclose what we are looking at
Turn your avatar around to face the camera while walking backwards.
Max amount of velocity boobs can have
Internal friction (brings boobs to rest). Shouldn't ever be above 1.
Friction Fraction of FPS (used to keep friction uniform through FPS change).
Amount of influence along the X and Y planes.
When true, dialogs from alerts will be blocked.
When false, antispam, not relating to dialog blocking, will be turned off.
When true, dialogs from friendship requests will be blocked.
When true, dialogs from group invites will be blocked.
When true, dialogs from group invites that require an entry fee will be blocked.
When true, dialogs from group notices will be blocked.
When true, dialogs from inventory item offers will be blocked.
When AntiSpamItemOffers is false but this is true, dialogs from inventory item offers of landmarks will be blocked.
When true, dialogs from friends will not be blocked unless the _NACL_Antispam is true.
When true, dialogs from your own objects will not be blocked unless the _NACL_Antispam is true.
When true, notifications will appear any time a spamtype is blocked.
When true, dialogs from scripts, including script-driven teleports and questions, and other interactive script stuff, will be blocked.
When true, dialogs from teleport requests from other residents will be blocked.
When true, dialogs from teleport offers from other residents will be blocked.
When true, all dialogs will be blocked, resets on restart.
Collect spamtypes together, instead of individually counting them; Use in cases of extreme spam, only.
Time in seconds for spamtype to accumulate to more than _NACL_AntiSpamAmount and be blocked
Count of spamtype to be reached during _NACL_AntiSpamTime before the spam blocking will occur.
Multiplier for _NACL_AntiSpamTime for sounds heard in _NACL_AntiSpamTime interval needed to trigger a block, since sounds are more common than messages
How many newlines a message is allowed to have without being considered spam.
Multiplier for _NACL_AntiSpamTime for sounds preloaded in _NACL_AntiSpamTime interval needed to trigger a block, since sound preloads are more common than messages
Color of chat messages from other residents
Color of instant messages from other residents
Color of chat messages from objects only visible to the owner
Color of chat messages from objects
Color of chat messages from SL System
Color of chat messages loaded from your log
Sound file for alerts (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for invalid keystroke (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for mouse click (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for mouse button release (uuid for sound asset)
Log UI sound effects as they are played
Sound file for female pain (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for male pain (uuid for sound asset)
Amount of health reduction required to trigger "pain" sound
Sound file for invalid operations (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for L$ balance increase (uuid for sound asset)
Amount of change in L$ balance required to trigger "money" sound
Sound file for L$ balance decrease(uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for new instant message session(uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for object creation (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for object deletion (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for rezzing objects (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for derezzing objects (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for opening pie menu (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for closing pie menu (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for selecting pie menu item 0 (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for selecting pie menu item 1 (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for selecting pie menu item 2 (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for selecting pie menu item 3 (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for selecting pie menu item 4 (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for selecting pie menu item 5 (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for selecting pie menu item 6 (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for selecting pie menu item 7 (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for region restarting (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for taking a snapshot (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for starting a new IM session (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for teleporting (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for starting to type a chat message (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for closing a window (uuid for sound asset)
Sound file for opening a window (uuid for sound asset)
A URL pointing to a crash report handler; overrides cluster negotiation to locate crash handler.
Time before automatically setting AFK (away from keyboard) mode (seconds)
Transparency of active floaters (floaters that have focus)
Display advanced parameter settings in snaphot interface
Current Session Agent Appearance Service URL
Set if there's unsupported hardware and we've already done a notification.
Automatically set AFK (away from keyboard) mode when idle
Allow selecting an avatar that you have modify rights on (via tag) while in edit mode to reposition them
Tapping a direction key twice and holding it down makes avatar run
Show active animations in a bubble above avatars head
Play animation preview in-world when uploading
When entering appearance editing mode, camera zooms in on currently selected portion of avatar
When in appearance editing mode, hitting escape will work the same as the close button
When in appearance editing mode, avatar is shown with special lighting
Preview selections in color picker immediately
Preview selections in texture picker immediately
While cursor is in chat entry box, arrow keys still control your avatar
Turns off dialog asking if you want to enable crash reporting
When auctioning land, include parcel boundary marker in snapshot
Scale of doppler effect on moving audio sources (1.0 = normal, <1.0 = diminished doppler effect, >1.0 = enhanced doppler effect)
Master audio level, or overall volume
Controls the distance-based dropoff of audio volume (fraction or multiple of default audio rolloff)
Controls the distance-based dropoff of audio volume when camera is submerged (fraction or multiple of default audio rolloff)
Audio level of in-world sound effects
Audio level of UI sound effects
Audio level of wind noise when standing still
Replaces keywords with a configured word or phrase
Automatically accept new inventory, regardless of type
Automatically load ALL profile webpages without asking first.
Login automatically using last username/password combination
Enable viewer mime type discovery of media URLs
Keep camera position locked when avatar walks to selected position
Update snapshot when camera stops moving, or any parameter changes
Fly by holding jump key or using "Fly" command (FALSE = fly by using "Fly" command only)
Add rim lighting to avatar rendering to approximate shininess of skin
Specifies sort key for textures in avatar picker (+0 = name, +1 = date, +2 = folders always by name, +4 = system folders to top)
Angle between avatar facing and camera facing at which avatar turns to face same direction as camera, when moving slowly (degrees)
Angle between avatar facing and camera facing at which avatar turns to face same direction as camera, when moving fast (degrees)
Specifes the maximum time in seconds to wait before sending your baked textures for avatar appearance. Set to 0 to disable and wait until all baked textures are at highest resolution.
Specifes the maximum time in seconds to wait before updating your appearance during appearance mode.
Amount of time to yield every frame to other applications when SL is not the foreground window (milliseconds)
Don't turn off BeaconsVisible when beacons floater is closed
FOR TESTING ONLY: Tell the built-in web browser to ignore SSL cert errors.
(WARNING: Advanced feature. Use if you are aware of the implications). Enable or disable the viewer to Javascript bridge object.
Drop around 50% of VisualParam occurances in appearance messages (for simulating Ruth)
Type of proxy for Web Browser
Proxy type to use for HTTP operations
Bulk permission changes affect body parts
Bulk changed objects can be copied by everyone
Bulk changed objects can be copied by next owner
Bulk changed objects can be modified by next owner
Bulk changed objects can be resold or given away by next owner
Bulk changed objects are shared with the currently active group
Number of flashes after which flashing buttons stay lit up
Controls the location of the local disk cache
Controls number of regions to be cached for objects.
Controls amount of hard drive space reserved for local file caching in MB
Camera zooms in and out with mousewheel
Render with camera offset from view frustum (rendering debug)
Default camera position relative to focus point when entering build mode
Initial camera offset from avatar in Rear View
Initial camera offset from avatar in Front View
Initial camera offset from avatar in Group View
Camera position when last logged out (global coordinates)
Preset camera position - view (0 - rear, 1 - front, 2 - group)
How many seconds it takes the camera to transition between focal distances
Maximum camera circle of confusion for DoF effect
Camera f-number value for DoF effect
Camera focal length for DoF effect (in millimeters)
Vertical camera field of view for DoF effect (in degrees)
Camera aspect ratio for DoF effect
Whenever keyboard focus is removed from the UI, and the chat bar is visible, the chat bar takes focus
When printable characters keys (possibly with Shift held) are pressed, the chatbar takes focus
Opacity of chat bubble background (0.0 = completely transparent, 1.0 = completely opaque)
Size of chat text in chat console (0 = small, 1 = big)
Chat console takes up full width of SL window
Show chat history window separately from Communicate window.
Max number of active members we'll show up for an unresponsive group
Time we give the server to send group participants before we hit the server for group info (seconds)
Provide notifications for when friend log on and off of SL
Do not echo/log notifications in chat
Time for which chat stays visible in console (seconds)
Add extra vertical spacing between local chat lines
Persisted client settings file name (per install).
Close snapshot window after saving snapshot
URL of agent host to connect to in Agent Domain.
The user's grid choice or ip address.
Command line specified helper web CGI prefix to use.
Command line specified login server and CGI prefix to use.
Rectangle for script Recompile Everything output window
Log in a god if you have god access.
Opacity of chat console (0.0 = completely transparent, 1.0 = completely opaque)
User definable offset between the bottom of the chat console and the bottom of the window; increase to move text in the console up
Size of chat console history (lines of chat)
Max number of lines of chat text visible in console.
Show contacts window separately from Communicate window.
Enable Javascript in the built-in Web browser?
Enable Web plugins in the built-in Web browser?
After using create tool, keep the create tool active
Maximum total number of simultaneous curl connections
Maximum number of simultaneous curl connections per host:port service
Extra time in seconds added to CurlTimeoutConnect for the initial connect to a host
Maximum time allowed until a connection is established (after adding the easy handle) until the server is considered unreachable and the connection is terminated
Maximum time the viewer will wait between sending data to the server and receiving (a partial) reply
If a transfer speed drops below this value (in bytes/s) during CurlTimeoutLowSpeedTime seconds, the transfer is considered too slow and is terminated
If a transfer speed drops below CurlTimeoutLowSpeedLimit (in bytes/s) during this amount of seconds, the transfer is considered too slow and is terminated

Maximum total time of a curl transaction, from when the easy handle is added till the transaction has completed. This INCLUDES DNS lookups (CurlTimeoutDNSLookup), connect time (CurlTimeoutConnect) and waiting for the first server reply (CurlTimeoutReply) as well as the actually time needed for data transfer

Maximum total time of a curl request, from when it is requested till the transaction has completed. This includes queuing due to connection throttling on top of the events covered by CurlTimeoutMaxTransaction
Treat Joystick values as absolute positions (not deltas).
Specifies IP address or hostname of grid to which you connect
Ignore server-enforced limits on animated objects. This is only useful for server testing.
Allow left-click interaction with animated objects. Uncertain how much performance impact this will have.
Temporary testing: allow an extra scale factor to be forced on animated objects.
Max visual offset between object position and rendered position
Max bounding box size for animated object's rendered position
How many aspects to consider for avatar bounding box
Dump a bunch of XML files when handling appearance messages
Display times for avatars to resolve.
Display time for loading avatar local textures.
Colorize avatar meshes based on baked/composite state.
Size of lines for Debug Beacons
Hide empty system folders when on
Turn on debugging display for inventory filtering
Log permissions for selected inventory items
Disable the code which watches for plugins that are crashed or hung
Display values of current view and projection matrices.

Texture used as 'Blank' in texture picker for normal map. (UUID texture reference)
Texture used as 'Default' in texture picker for normal map. (UUID texture reference)
Texture used as 'Default' in texture picker for specular map. (UUID texture reference)
Texture used as 'Default' in texture picker. (UUID texture reference)
Disable the normal bounds put on the camera by avatar position
Disable GL rendering and GUI (load testing)
Disable highlighting and linking of URLs in XUI text boxes
Update frames as fast as possible (FALSE = update frames between display scans)
Display Latest Chat message on LCD
Display Console Debug Information on LCD
Display Latest IM message on LCD
Whether to use the auto default to 128 draw distance
Whether to use the auto default to 96 draw distance
Enable click to buy actions in tool pie menu
Enable click to pay actions in tool pie menu
Enable double-click to teleport where allowed
Enable double-click to show world map from mini map
Seconds before displaying tooltip when performing drag and drop operation
Number of pixels that mouse should move before triggering drag and drop mode
Amount camera lags behind avatar motion (0 = none, 30 = avatar velocity)
When entering build mode, camera moves up above avatar
Select individual parts of linked objects
Number of decimals for the edit tool position, size and rotation settings (0 to 5)
1 = normal behavior, 0 = disable display of swirling lights when scripts communicate
Use Ctrl+mouse to grab and manipulate objects
Play sounds from your gestures when EnableGestureSounds is false. (Useless otherwise)
Play sounds from your non-gestures when EnableNongestureSounds is false. (Useless otherwise)
Allow first person perspective and mouse control of camera
Enable talking to other residents with a microphone
Seconds between display of FPS in log (0 for never)
Seconds between display of FPS in log (0 for never)
Filter results flagged gaming in everything search
Filter results flagged gaming in classifieds search
Filter results flagged gaming in event search
Filter results flagged gaming in groups search
Filter results flagged gaming in land search
Filter results flagged gaming in sim search
Maximum number of inventory items to match against search filter every frame (lower to increase framerate while searching, higher to improve search speed)
Enables filtering of land search results by area
Enables filtering of land search results by price
Controls which type of land you are searching for in Find Land interface ("All", "Auction", "For Sale")
Limits people search to only users who are logged on
Display only results of find places that have pictures
Display avatar and attachments below neck while in mouselook
Specifies that you have not run the viewer since you installed the latest update
Specifies that you have not successfully logged in since you installed the latest update
Weather effects do not change over time
Short time format (hours and minutes) to use
Long time format (hours, minutes and seconds) to use
TRUE to add seconds to timestamps for IM and chat
TRUE to add seconds to timestamps for Log
Whether to sort up or down
Rectangle for the area search floater
Rectangle for beacon and highlight controls
Rectangle for contacts floater in horizontal mode
Rectangle for the Debug Settings floater
Width for radar's voice status column
Keeps radar updates running in background
How far away avatars on the radar can be, 0 for no limit
When false, pauses the radar until further notice, good for banning someone who just left.
Show the flood of people arriving and (if RadarAlertFloodLeaving) leaving when you login and when you open/close the Radar with RadarKeepOpen off.
When activated along with RadarAlertFlood shows the flood of people leaving when you close the Radar with RadarKeepOpen off.
Whether the radar emits chat alerts for avatars entering/exiting sim
Whether the radar emits chat alerts for avatars entering/exiting draw distance
Whether the radar emits chat alerts for avatars entering/exiting shout range
Whether the radar emits chat alerts for avatars entering/exiting chat range
Whether the radar emits chat alerts for avatars younger than AvatarAgeAlertDays appearing.
Age below which avatars will be made known to you
Whether the radar emits chat alerts regarding the status of avatars it displays
Enable alerting scripts about avatars detected by the radar
Do not ask if RadarChatKeys should be enabled when a script requests for the radar's keys.
Sort order for the radar, map of column names to ascending boolean
Rectangle for floater object im info windows
Rectangle for web search browser window
Show SoundTriggers/gestures played by agents in the log. Also includes collision sounds if enabled
Show sounds played by objects in the log. Also includes collision sounds if enabled
Don't filter out default collision sounds in the log
Only show one entry for each unique asset ID in the log
[DO NOT MODIFY] Controls layout of floating windows within SL window
Automatically close KeyTool floater when a result is found
Show SoundTriggers/gestures played by agents in the log. Also includes collision sounds if enabled
Show sounds played by objects in the log. Also includes collision sounds if enabled
Don't filter out default collision sounds in the log
Only show one entry for each unique asset ID in the log
Ignore parcel/region setting that blocks flying
Treat Flycam values as absolute positions (not deltas).
Scale factor to apply to flycam movements when in build mode.
Map flycam zoom axis directly to camera zoom.
Was flying when last logged out, so fly when logging in
Initial focus point offset relative to avatar for the camera preset Rear View (x-axis is forward)
Initial focus point offset relative to avatar for the camera preset Front View
Initial focus point offset relative to avatar for the camera preset Group View
Camera focus point when last logged out (global coordinates)
Seconds before automatically expanding the folder under the mouse when performing inventory drag and drop
Seconds to wait before showing the LOADING... text in folder views
Font resolution, higher is bigger (pixels per inch)
For testing what does and does not work when using HTTPS upload
For testing what does and does not work when using HTTPS upload
Force wearable fetches to fail for this asset type.
Always show grid dropdown on login screen
For QA: On next startup, forces the auto-updater to run
Aspect ratio of fullscreen display (width / height)
Automatically detect proper aspect ratio for fullscreen display
Highlight cross sections of prims with grid manipulation plane.
Snap grid reference frame (0 = world, 1 = local, 2 = reference object)
Grid line opacity (0.0 = completely transparent, 1.0 = completely opaque)
Display fractional grid steps, relative to grid size
Maximum number of times to divide single snap grid unit when GridSubUnit is true
URL of last help page, will be shown next time help is accessed
URL for Search website, displayed in the Find floater
Double resolution of snapshot from current window resolution
Last URL visited via help system
Rectangle for HTML Release Message Floater window
Enable debug output to more precisely identify sources of import errors. Warning: the output can slow down import on many machines.
Limits amount of importer generated models for dae files
Enable preprocessing for DAE files to fix some ColladaDOM related problems (like support for space characters within names and ids).
If TRUE use HTTP GET to fetch textures from the server
Transparency of inactive floaters (floaters that have no focus)
Automatically fetch the inventory in the background after login
Seconds before automatically opening inventory when mouse is over inventory button when performing inventory drag and drop
Rate at which we simulate failures of copy/link requests in some operations
Rate at which we simulate late-completing copy/link requests in some operations
Override received items inventory inbox display
Show the legacy Merchant Outbox UI as well as the Marketplace Listings UI
Enable debug output associated with the Merchant Outbox.
Enable making the Merchant Outbox and Inbox visible in the inventory for debug purposes.
Maximum number of subfolders allowed in a listing in the merchant outbox.
Maximum number of nested levels of subfolders allowed in a listing in the merchant outbox.
Maximum number of items allowed in a listing in the merchant outbox.
Maximum number of items allowed in a stock folder.
Specifies sort key for inventory items (+0 = name, +1 = date, +2 = folders always by name, +4 = system folders to top)
When in mouselook, moving mouse up looks down and vice verse (FALSE = moving up looks up)
Enables the Joystick to control Avatar movement.
Flycam hardware axis mapping for internal axis 0 ([0, 5]).
Flycam hardware axis mapping for internal axis 1 ([0, 5]).
Flycam hardware axis mapping for internal axis 2 ([0, 5]).
Flycam hardware axis mapping for internal axis 3 ([0, 5]).
Flycam hardware axis mapping for internal axis 4 ([0, 5]).
Flycam hardware axis mapping for internal axis 5 ([0, 5]).
Flycam hardware axis mapping for internal axis 6 ([0, 5]).
Enables the Joystick to move edited objects.
Enables the Joystick to control the flycam.
Whether or not a joystick has been detected and initiailized.
Use advanced Jpeg2000 compression options (precincts, blocks, ordering, markers)
Size of image precincts. Assumed square and same for all levels. Must be power of 2.
Size of encoding blocks. Assumed square and same for all levels. Must be power of 2. Max 64, Min 4.
Size of affected region when using teraform tool
Use case insensitivity when searching in LSL editor
URL that points to LSL help files, with [LSL_STRING] corresponding to the referenced LSL function or keyword
Let other residents see our language information
[DO NOT MODIFY] Version number for tracking hardware changes
Controls which find operation appears by default when clicking "Find" button
Last selected tab in preferences window

The last grass selected in the create dialog
The last tree selected in the create dialog
Allow the viewer to automatically hide attachments that are really just way too big
Skip exporting faces with default transparent texture or full transparent
Apply texture params suchs as repeats to the exported UV map
Image file format to use when exporting Collada
Controls behavior when viewer crashes (0 = never send crash report, 1 = always send crash report)
(obsolete) Everyone can copy the newly created objects
(obsolete) Newly created objects can be copied by next owner
(obsolete) Newly created objects can be modified by next owner
(obsolete) Newly created objects can be resold or given away by next owner
(obsolete) Newly created objects are shared with the currently active group
Enable media domain filtering (0 = Off, 1 = Blacklist only, 2 = Prompt)
